topic.title: Keeping you informed
topic.shortdesc: The NHS Data Model and Dictionary Service operates a Mailing List service.

section.p: The NHS Data Model and Dictionary Service operates a Mailing List service, which is specifically designed to make users aware of changes to their products, such as:

ul.li: New NHS Data Model and Dictionary releases;
Proposed changes to the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.

section.p: To subscribe to the mailing list, please send an email to information.standards@nhs.net, with 'NHS Data Model and Dictionary Mailing List' in the subject field.
